thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie
thread.title: E22290
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by E22290

author: E22290
title: E22290
text: Very unhappy with Harvey Norman service. Unfriendly staff at Naas branch. Was mistake done buy Harvey Norman,for which nobody apologized even. I was meant to collect item the next day, and it was allowing to order and pay online(click and collect), that wasn't true after traveling to Naas store where it was showing online that the product is available, that wasn't true it wasn't there.I Had to wait more than a week before they delivered it to Naas store, this item was a present for my mother which isn't getting received for her Birthday because of delay. So dissapointing and very sad over dealing with your store.Won't recommend to anyone.
